name: Long Drive: The Road Trip Game
name_original: Long Drive: The Road Trip Game
description:
- Check engine oil and lubricants
- Keep your tank full and don't forget to take extra gasoline
- Don't forget to keep your shotgun loaded. This journey involves many risks.
- Use vending machines on bus stops to buy snacks
- Avoid hurdles, to safe yourself from critical car crash
- Keep your truck filled with useful items
